Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Purgatory
Holy fire will strike undead enemy creatures in the God's Dominion. The more powerful the Dominion, the more undead will be killed.
All hostile undead beings have Dominion * 10% chance of being hit by 18 AP fire Dmg
